sculkmuffler.gui.range.about: This allows you to visualize the range that a muffler works across. Note that this affects all nearby players and not just yourself.
sculkmuffler.gui.contain.about: When this is enabled, the muffler will prevent sounds from leaving the area around it, rather than silencing them entirely. This can be used to, as an example, keep music from escaping a room.
sculkmuffler.gui.sound.about: This allows you to configure a list of sounds for the muffler to allow, or a list to block specifically while allowing all others.
sculkmuffler.gui.category.about: This allows you to configure a list of sound categories (Hostile Mobs, Blocks, etc.) to allow, or a list to block specifically while allowing all others.
sculkmuffler.gui.target-mode.about: When in Allowlist mode, the selected sounds will be allowed to play normally and all others will be affected by the muffler. In Denylist mode, the selected sounds are affected by the muffler while all others are allowed to play normally.
sculkmuffler.gui.view.nearby.about: List all sounds that have recently played within range of this muffler.
sculkmuffler.gui.view.selected.about: List all sounds that have been selected.
sculkmuffler.config.muffling.bell.heard: Bell Heard by Entities Cutoff Volume
sculkmuffler.advancements.sneak_1000.des: Make noise near a Warden, but go undetected thanks to a Sculk Muffler.
A Sonic Boom is just a really loud sound. Let's quiet that down so it doesn't hurt our ears, or anything else.
